Desc.entry: Local tenants and residents association covering Deerlands Avenue, Drummond Crescent, Drummond Road, Elm Lane, Emerson Close, Emerson Crescent, Ingelow Avenue, Lindsay Avenue, Lindsay Crescent, Lindsay Drive, Lindsay Road, Masters Crescent, Masters Road and Swanbourne Road.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon at 1pm (bingo), Wed 10am-3pm (open day and library), 2nd Wed in the month 10am-3pm (community police and housing team), 3rd Thurs in the month 12noon-1pm (councillor's surgery)

category.entry: TENANTS AND RESIDENTS GROUPS - POSTAL DISTRICT 5
